text: UMthunywa ukholwa koko kutyhilwe kuye kuvela eNkosini yakhe, benza njalo nabakholwayo. Ngamnye kubo ukholwa kuAllâh, kwiiNgelosi zaKhe kwiiNcwadi zaKhe nakubaThunywa baKhe. (Bathi asenzi mahluko phakathi kwaba baProfeti, bathi kananjalo: “Siyeva, sithobele). (Sicela) uxolelo lwezono kuWe, Nkosi yethu, kananjalo sikuWe isiphelo sethu (sonke)”
